data.name: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ Break The Fog MP030
data.detailed_description:
About

"Tiger Tank 59" is a top-down shooting game

In this game , Players need to control their tanks,
through the enemy lines, break the enemy base,
or defeat the enemy tanks

Features

The DLC include the map pack 030

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(r) Core (TM)2 CPU -T7200 @ 2.50 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Raedon X1600 / Nvidia GeForce 8600M GT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
